Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory271.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are you okay, Commandant?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland's stun grenade has not dealt any actual damage. It seems like he only meant to stall your advances."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The road to Core Area's blocked from the inside. There's nothing we can do on this end.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'With this distance... no way we can cross without any flight equipment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No use waiting here, then. Let's return to the surface and see if the Support Force has brought any equipment we can use.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Can't believe he got away again... What exactly is he after?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Understood. Then let's retreat for now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory274.png'}
{3: 'The elevator in the Core Area rumbles as it descends.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1601_4.jpg'}
{3: 'The abnormal fluctuation of energy of her frame was most obvious during the last battle.'}

{3: 'It has happened before, and it has been getting more frequent. Although it has yet to cause any real problem, Luna did come across a moment when she could not control her power during that fight.'}
{3: 'She frowns, quietly inspecting her frame, unable to comprehend where the anomaly originates.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Gabriel stands silently behind Luna, observing her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory275.png'}
{3: 'The elevator stops at the bottommost level. Gabriel removes his hat and holds it in front of his chest, and raises his other arm.'}
{3: 'With his graceful, showman-like gesture, the darkness parted like curtains on a stage, slowly revealing the form that has been hiding in the dark.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'All of this is for the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna, this is my answer to your questionâ€”', 4: '1'}
